What is Kooplex?

Features

These are the ...

Collaborative

Well elaborated file structure using access control list. We use GitLab, Gitea, Seafile ...

Only open source components

Jupyter, Rstudio, python modules, .....

Open source code

Hosted by Github. Consists of a configuration repo and a frontend repo

Collaborative

Well elaborated file structure using access control list. We use GitLab, Gitea, Seafile ...

Only open source components

Jupyter, Rstudio, python modules, .....

Served by

Modularized, fast and easy to customize

ENA at EBI

The European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) provides a comprehensive record of the world's nucleotide sequencing information, covering raw sequencing data, sequence assembly information and functional annotation.

  • Client: EBI
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Bioinformatics
